amendment.description: An amendment numbered 454 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to prevent any position in the competitive service from being reclassified to an excepted service schedule that was created after September 30, 2020 and limit federal employee reclassifications to the five excepted service schedules in use prior to fiscal year 2021.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prevents any position in the competitive service from being reclassified to an excepted service schedule that was created after September 30, 2020 and limit federal employee reclassifications to the five excepted service schedules in use prior to fiscal year 2021.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A039) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 201 (Roll no. 344).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A039) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A039) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 201 (Roll no. 344).
